title: 11th Grade
alt: And the ten minutes striking up a conversation with that strange kid in homeroom sometimes matters more than every other part of high school combined.
transcript:
[Above a bar graph:]
11th-grade activities:
[The y axis is labeled:]
Usefulness to career success
[Above the x-axis are two small and one huge bar. Below the axis each bar is labeled:]
900 hours of classes
400 hours of homework
One weekend messing with Perl
